name: Run Boy
description:
Run Boy is my first ever submission for a game jam. Specifically the Nokia 3310 Jam 3. It's been an awesome experience and a slight step up from my first video game, Pong. The theme was on/off, which got me thinking switch, which got me flipping this little guy from floor to ceiling.

If someone gets a score higher than 1000, let me know. I'll have to make the score summary larger ;)

Made with Phaser 3

Credits

Made by Josh 🤠
